item.title: Responding to a Pickup Truck Fire
item.description: First responders arrive to manage a pickup truck fire on the interstate, working to secure the scene and restore traffic safety. What part of emergency response interests you most?

media:content.media:title: Responding to a Pickup Truck Fire
media:content.media:description: First responders arrive to manage a pickup truck fire on the interstate, working to secure the scene and restore traffic safety. What part of emergency response interests you most?

item.title: Slowly But Surely Done!
item.description: Watch a careful, steady recovery come together as each step brings the job closer to completion. Which detail of the process stands out to you?

item.title: It Looks So Easy Doesn't it?
item.description: A behind-the-scenes look at a recovery that appears simple but requires skill, timing, and teamwork to get it right. What part would challenge you the most?

item.title: Everyday Tow, Extraordinary Truck: Meet the 2024 Western Star!
item.description: Explore the power and features of the 2024 Western Star as it takes on daily towing work with ease. Which feature of this truck impresses you most?

item.title: Night Job Completed!
item.description: A look at a smooth, well-coordinated nighttime recovery as the team wraps up another job safely and efficiently. What’s your favorite part of watching night operations?

item.title: Code 3 We Got to Roll!
item.description: Join the crew as they respond quickly and safely to a call, showing the coordination and focus needed in urgent situations. What part of the response interests you most?

item.title: When Every Second Counts
item.description: A look at a time-sensitive emergency response where coordination and quick decisions make all the difference. What part of the process would you prioritize?

item.title: Don't Panic, We Got This HAZMAT Rollover
item.description: A skilled response team works through a controlled, safety-focused recovery after a HAZMAT rollover. How does planning help in situations like this?

item.title: Honoring the Legends Who Shaped the Towing World
item.description: A tribute to the people, stories, and innovations that helped define the towing industry. Which story from the past inspires you most?

item.title: Getting a Trailer Back on Its Wheels
item.description: Follow the careful recovery steps taken to safely upright a trailer and get it ready for transport again. What part of the process would you focus on?

item.title: Trusting the "Pick & Pull"
item.description: A look at how strategic lifting and smart planning make a tricky recovery go smoothly. Would you rely on this technique in a tight spot?

item.title: Rescuing a Massive Batwing from the Muck
item.description: Watch a careful recovery as a large batwing mower is lifted out of heavy mud and back into action. What part of the process surprised you?

item.title: Fishing Friday: Two Jobs, One Video!
item.description: Join a busy day in the field as two different recovery tasks unfold in one smooth workflow. Which recovery caught your attention?

item.title: Mission Possible: Saving the Car in the Night
item.description: A late-night recovery brings teamwork and skill together to safely bring a stranded car back to solid ground. How would you handle a job after dark?

item.title: School Bus Flips in Flood!
item.description: A school bus is swept up in rising floodwaters, and crews work to assess the situation and safely recover the vehicle. What steps help responders handle scenes like this?

item.title: Tator Shows Its Strength on a Tough Job
item.description: The Tator steps up to handle a demanding recovery, using power and precision to move heavy equipment safely. How will it perform under pressure?

item.title: A Recovery Mission Takes an Unexpected Turn
item.description: A routine recovery becomes more challenging than expected, pushing the team to adjust strategy and stay focused on safety. How will they get the job back under control?

item.title: When a Flatbed Load Goes Wrong
item.description: A flatbed load shifts unexpectedly, and the crew steps in with careful planning and equipment to stabilize and recover it safely. What caused the load to slip?

item.title: Wrong Way Wreck Shuts Down Interstate
item.description: A wrong-way incident leads to a full interstate shutdown as crews work to clear vehicles and restore traffic flow safely. How long will the cleanup take?

item.title: Snowy Wheel Trouble? We’re On the Job
item.description: Wheel trouble in the snow? We're on it!
